name: Endless Wandering 2
description:
First game in a year of trying to make one game a month.

My 3rd exploration of making a work with generated worlds. In this version all the computation is done on the GPU. Can be played on PC's without a GPU, but for the ultimate experience it is advised.

Visit http://daanderkx.com/ for more.

Controls:

WASD to move
MOUSE to look around
SPACE to jump
SHIFT to run

Credits:

Music used: Creeping Up on You - Godmode
Code base for marching cubes: https://github.com/Wenzy--/Marching-cube-in-Unity
